mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_ENBASINFFCSSGMT (FCSINFSGMTSEQNO, NATIONALITY, REGADD, ADMDIVOFREG, ESTABLISHDATE, BIZENDDATE, BIZRANGE, ECOINDUSCATE, ECOTYPE, ENTSCALE, FCSINFOUPDATE,ReportFlag) values (#{FcsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Nationality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RegAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AdmDivOfReg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EstablishDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BizEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BizRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EcoIndusCate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EcoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EntScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FcsInfoUpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_ENBASINFFCSSGMT set NATIONALITY = #{Nationality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGADD = #{RegAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMDIVOFREG = #{AdmDivOfReg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ESTABLISHDATE = #{EstablishDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIZENDDATE = #{BizEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIZRANGE = #{BizRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ECOINDUSCATE = #{EcoIndusCate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ECOTYPE = #{EcoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTSCALE = #{EntScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCSINFOUPDATE = #{FcsInfoUpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ReportFlag=#{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FCSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{FcsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select FCSINFSGMTSEQNO, NATIONALITY, REGADD, ADMDIVOFREG, ESTABLISHDATE, BIZENDDATE, BIZRANGE, ECOINDUSCATE, ECOTYPE, ENTSCALE, FCSINFOUPDATE,ReportFlag from PBCRS_REPORT_ENBASINFFCSSGMT where FCSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{FcsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select FCSINFSGMTSEQNO, NATIONALITY, REGADD, ADMDIVOFREG, ESTABLISHDATE, BIZENDDATE, BIZRANGE, ECOINDUSCATE, ECOTYPE, ENTSCALE, FCSINFOUPDATE from PBCRS_REPORT_ENBASINFFCSSGMT
mapper.insert:
insert into PBCRS_REPORT_ENBASINFFCSSGMTM (REPORTFLAG, FCSINFSGMTSEQNO, NATIONALITY, REGADD, ADMDIVOFREG, ESTABLISHDATE, BIZENDDATE, BIZRANGE, ECOINDUSCATE, ECOTYPE, ENTSCALE, FCSINFOUPDATE, etl_date
) select '0', FCSINFSGMTSEQNO, NATIONALITY, REGADD, ADMDIVOFREG, ESTABLISHDATE, BIZENDDATE, BIZRANGE, ECOINDUSCATE, ECOTYPE, ENTSCALE, FCSINFOUPDATE, to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') from PBCRS_REPORT_ENBASINFFCSSGMT where FCSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{FCSINFSGMTSEQNO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
